meanings.sent1: The nondemand task can be completed later.

meanings.definition: Not subject to immediate availability or fulfillment.
meanings.sent1: The nondemand product was not in stock at the moment.
meanings.sent2: They decided to focus on nondemand services to avoid inventory issues.
meanings.sent3: The nondemand delivery seemed like a fun challenge to tackle.
meanings.sent4: His patience was a nondemand well, never running dry.
meanings.sent5: The nondemand supply chain ensured products were always available when needed.
